website_summaries.verdict: This is an organic, fermented vitamin supplement targeting women’s overall health without synthetic fillers or animal gelatin.
pros: Contains probiotics to enhance gut function
Certified organic, non-GMO, vegetarian, kosher, and gluten-free
Some users also report improvement of menopausal symptoms with use
cons: Bigger pills, which can be difficult for some people to swallow
Some reports of pills arriving broken

customer_reviews.title: Consumerlab just did a test on this vitamin and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Consumerlab just did a test on this vitamin and it completely failed. Vitamins must dissolve within 30 minutes per guidelines but this one took 3 hours. I'm returning my purchase and will avoid New Chapter going forward
customer_reviews.author: JFK

customer_reviews.title: Great Vitamin for anyone going through Menapause.
customer_reviews.text: Love love this new vitamin. I’m going through the change in my 40s now. It’s been rough to say the least. I really try to look for great quality vitamins and organic food. This has been a great boost for as I was losing a lot of energy and hair. I will stay on this Vitamin and not purchase inexpensive ones from drug stores any longer. Our bodies need the best.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: I've been taking New Chapter for years. I buy ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking New Chapter for years. I buy them either on Amazon or health store. I used work for an herb shop/wellness center and they were big on New Chapter. 1. they derive their vitamins, by fermenting actual food and herbs, and this creates the probiotic in the supplements. Back in 2012 or around then, New Chapter was sold to Proctor and Gamble. A lot of concern was that the content and quality would suffer. I am not sure if this is true, but I do know many of their supplements were discontinued. Anyway, I continue to take their vitamins and have not noticed any changes.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: I was told by a nutritionist friend of mine that ...
customer_reviews.text: I was told by a nutritionist friend of mine that she uses New Chapter One A Day Multi-Vitamins and that I should too. So I listened to her advice and now seem to have more energy than ever. I think it is because New Chapter contains just about every vitamin and mineral necessary to lead a healthy life. Just look at the label !
customer_reviews.author: DIANE ROGERS

customer_reviews.title: Organic Multi Vitamin
customer_reviews.text: I like the New Chapter products and have been taking this multi for years!!! I was given a sample from a health store after I told the lady at the store that I don't take any vitamins because they always made me nauseous. She told me they are organic and I would not have the same reaction. She was right and have been buying them ever since.
customer_reviews.author: Аmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Vitamins! No Upset Stomach or Nervousness!
customer_reviews.text: I love these vitamins! I stopped taking vitamins because they upset my stomach and would keep me up for days. I then found out that it was the iron that was wreaking such havoc. I don't have any of those issues with these vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to give zero stars, but it was not ...
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to give zero stars, but it was not possible. The bottle was open and the tablets are NOT vitamins. I will have them analyzed - we are talking about negligence and tampering.
customer_reviews.author: AndreaHM

customer_reviews.title: Severely Damaged Pills!
customer_reviews.text: Although I usually love these vitamins, these were such a disappointing product. More than half the bottle consisted of crumbs and broken halves of theses pills. I literally only got half of the quantity I paid for...
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: Helping me with Hairloss
customer_reviews.text: First, I picked these up at a WholeFoods for a woman over 40 for a complete daily vitamin (better price on the bottle I ordered here on Amazon). Well! This product surprised me, I have been having trouble with my hair shedding do to Perimenopause (Iron Deficiency). I noticed after about 2 wks that my hair slowed down the shedding. I also take Iron pills/supplements (and was taking hair pills) but I did not see any changes in my health until I added this complete vitamin and stopped taking the hair pills. I am hooked for now! :) Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: MaverickCoils

customer_reviews.title: Best Vitamins for Women that Suffer PMS Badly
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to believe that anything can help PMS and moodiness when it comes to female hormones. I can't say enough good things about these vitamins if you are looking for things to be "even-keel" during your time of the month these vitamins are for you.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia M Karlowicz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product but large pill!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been taking New Chapter for 10 plus years! I’m 38 but started taking these because they have everything your body needs! I have taken them on an empty stomach with no issues. Compared to other multivitamins these are the most complete and have more bang for your buck! The only down side is the pills are very large! It’s hard to swallow! See picture
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Something is WRONG!
customer_reviews.text: Please know, the bottles were sealed.....and the bottles are glass. This is the second bottle of these vitamins that had half tablets mixed in. The first bottle was returned and replaced. Unfortunately, I'm just now noticing the broken tablets , and do not see an option to notify the seller for a complete refund at this time. Something is not RIGHT!
customer_reviews.author: Monique Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Get these vitamins!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is literally my favorite vitamin ever. I have switched it to different vitamins, I have always come back to this brand. I buy it Sprouts most of the time because of their great discounts on vitamins. If I’m busy and almost run out, I just purchase from Amazon for the convenience. I notice the difference in my body almost immediately on how much better I feel. These vitamins don’t disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Richelle

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I take this supplement everyday. I had acid issues from a disturbed microbiome after a prolonged period on antibiotics. I started taking this supplement in conjunction with triphala and monolaurin. Amazingly within a month my acid issues were gone and I was able to digest my food. The tablets are on the larger side but they can be split in half for easier swallowing. I didn’t notice much of a flavor even though the probiotics are fermented. I also didn’t experience any of the gas, bloating or burping that I have with other probiotic formulas. I recommend this product and will continue to buy as an everyday supplement for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Ormond & Lynda M Otvos

customer_reviews.title: Best Vitamins ever!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so thrilled that I found these vitamins. I have a sensitive tummy and would have to take regular vitamins with a full meal just to not get sick. These vitamins are made from organic ingredients and I can take them with a glass of water! They come in Women's One Daily, and 40+ Women's One Daily. (I'm now taking the 40+ ones). No more having to eat a truck load of food to take my vitamins! I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Sonja

customer_reviews.title: Damaged packaging
customer_reviews.text: I just received this item and opened the vitamin box where I see the glass bottle is broken in the box where tiny pieces is falling out the bottom. Please replace my vitamins or refund my payment. This has nothing to do with the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Cummings

customer_reviews.title: The best vitamin around for me
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite vitamin. I feel more alive, energetic and clear-minded when I take this vitamin everyday. If I take it on an empty stomach, though, I have to be sure to drink a full glass of water so I don’t get queasy. What I don’t like is that there is no calcium and magnesium, but I found that Costco Calcium magnesium supplement fills that void without overdosing.
customer_reviews.author: Viv

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for several years, and I can tell a difference when I don't use it. Because it's a whole food supplement, it absorbs all of the vitamins/nutrients. The only thing I am unsure about is the fermented soy. For those folks needing to avoid soy products, you may want to review before taking. I don't take thyroid medications, so I don't think it's adversely affecting me.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Douglass

customer_reviews.title: super hard to swallow
customer_reviews.text: I take vitamins all of the time and have bought other things from this brand but with these they stick in your throat with a bad taste. I tried 3 times but unable to swallow two in a row and some days they just stick and you gag and throw them up. Threw them out.....super sad because I love this brand and have never had a problem swallowing pills.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Broken Pills!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Almost all of the pills are broken!! It's impossible to know if you're taking the right ones paired together, and you run the risk of not getting the right nutrients with them in pieces. Very piss poor for so much money! DO NOT BUY!!

customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed the bottle say 24 tabs and there’s only 18 and 4 of those are broken in pieces. I was super excited to get this vitamins because I have been reading ONLY good things about the product but after this I will not buy it again.

customer_reviews.title: These are my favorite multi-vitamins! I like the fact that it's a ...

I hate to swallow pills and these haven’t been hard to swallow. I have only taken them a couple days but I already feel more energized and less bloated. I can’t wait to see how I feel after a few weeks of taking theses.

customer_reviews.title: Great multivitamin

With that said they are rather large. I, personally, don't have a hard time swallowing them, but I could see some people having a harder time. New Chapter has always stood behind their product's. I feel better taking this vitamin. Ask me 6 months from now and I'll give you an update. I took my last multivitamin for at least 10 years and I hope this one will replace it for an even longer period of time.

customer_reviews.title: The perfect vitamin!
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this brand for over 5 years. I took the prenatal one because I wanted the best nutrition and organic content for my child. After 3 years, I changed to the women's vitamin. Although, I can't make any medical claims, I feel like my immune system has been boosted and I get sick a lot less often and if I do, the severity and duration is quite a bit less. I really like this brand and hope they continue making this fantastic vitamin!!

customer_reviews.title: These are also good for keeping you regular
customer_reviews.text: These are my go to vitamins. It's a multivitamin, but I've noticed that when I take them my hair doesn't fall out. I barely notice one or two hairs a day when I take this. also, my nails seem to grow much faster. These are also good for keeping you regular.

customer_reviews.title: I like to split them in half and take them 2x ...
customer_reviews.text: I like to split them in half and take them 2x per day - the score makes this easy. They're of excellent quality and I got hooked on them when I worked at Whole Foods. Now I just buy them thru Amazon.

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Way too big of a pill to swallow. Chewing this pill is out of the question...too chalky. I wish I could get a refund. For $40...I expected better.

customer_reviews.title: the vitamins are great..
customer_reviews.text: Hey, the vitamins are great...unfortunately I just opened this container which has been setting in a drawer since I received it...the bottle was totally shattered. So be sure you check those bottles as soon as you receive them...and not doing it several months later. Otherwise they certainly would have been 5 stars!

The pills are large but I have no difficulty taking them before breakfast with no problem at all. Excellent choice! So glad I found a vitamin that makes a positive health difference!

customer_reviews.text: Best vitamins I have ever taken and been able to stomach. I’m chronically ill and I’m so thankful these help me so much. I’m on a fixed income being alone and disabled but I go without food when I have to place my order but they are worth the price.

customer_reviews.text: I really like these vitamins. I notice an increase in energy and overall feel better when I take them. I can take them on an empty stomach just fine. I do wish that some of the amounts (B vitamins,iodine,D3ect) of vitamins and minerals were higher..

customer_reviews.title: The Best I’ve Found Yet!!
customer_reviews.text: This vitamin is the best I’ve used thus far. Being that it’s plant-based is a plus. They are a bit big and sometimes hard for me to swallow BUT that can easily be fixed by breaking it in half if need be. I’m thoroughly loving these for all the right health reasons.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Patton

customer_reviews.title: Great multi for women!
customer_reviews.text: I’m over 40, and I love these vitamins! They do not bother my stomach, and (although they’re large pills) they are pretty easy to swallow. All my levels are normalized and in healthy range since I’ve been taking multi vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Stack

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to swallow!
customer_reviews.text: I've never had trouble swallowing pills -- I can often do it even without water. But these are ridiculous. I break them in half and down each half with a full glass of water and they STILL get stuck in my throat. The only way I can ingest them is by crushing each one up and putting it in my cereal. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Wow amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I happened to be sick and feeling a bit sluggish when these arrived. I had no energy and I needed to get a few things done. I took one of these and a little bit later I had some energy to do a few normal chores. I'm not saying it was a miracle cure but just one helped tremendously. I took 1 for the second time today and again I could feel energy returning. I will continue to take these. I'm not sure I will have a noticeable increase in energy while I'm feeling healthy but I know they are good because they are capable of it when I'm sick already.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Buress

customer_reviews.title: Great 40+ multi!
customer_reviews.text: Great multivitamin! This multi has additional supplements not included in some other "40+" products. I have suggested this product to all of my friends. I am very pleased with these vitamins. I am on my second bottle and plan to continue ordering them in the future. Thanks New Chapter.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: a multi-vitamin I can actually tolerate
customer_reviews.text: The vast majority of multi vitamins I've tried have too much iron or zinc for me and they end up making me nauseous. This pill can be broken in half easily so I was able to start with a smaller dose to see how I did with it. I'm seriously so excited that I can take this vitamin. I have so many bottles of abandoned multi vitamins.

customer_reviews.text: ONLY vitamin I’ve ever been able to take on an empty stomach. All others will make me sick within minutes and I throw them right back up. Will definitely reorder.

customer_reviews.text: I had a severe allergic reaction to this vitamin that I’ve never had with any other multivitamin. Broke out in huge hives all over.

product_meta.title: New Chapter Women's Multivitamin, Every Woman's One Daily 40+, Fermented with Probiotics + Vitamin D3 + B Vitamins + Organic Non-GMO Ingredients - 72 ct
product_meta.description:
Size:72 Count (Pack of 1)

If you're looking for the right multivitamin for women over 40, it's helpful to know there are differences between raw or USP multivitamins, gummy vitamins, and whole-food fermented multivitamins like New Chapter's Every Woman's One Daily 40+. This whole-food fermented vitamin is made with quality ingredients you can trust—way more than just isolated nutrients, and free from the animal gelatin and sweeteners of gummies. Our unique multivitamin is fermented with probiotics and expertly formulated to deliver bone support, hormone support, and digestion support for women's needs. All New Chapter multivitamins are gentle enough to take anytime—even on an empty stomach.


*These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease.
feature_bullets: EASIER TO DIGEST: Women’s 40+ multivitamin fermented with Whole Foods & Probiotics for better absorption, so your body can recognize it as food
ONE A DAY: Can be taken any time of day—Fermented multivitamins are easier to digest than isolated vitamins, and gentle even on an empty stomach. No nausea.
MULTIVITAMIN FOR WOMEN 40+: Expertly formulated for your needs including energy, stress, hormone, immune, and bone support*
SUPERFOODS: Clean, whole-food fermented multivitamin delivers Superfoods like Ginger, organic Turmeric & Fenugreek
Made with Certified Organic Vegetables & Herbs, Non-GMO Project Verified, Vegetarian, Certified Kosher, Certified Gluten Free, No Synthetic Fillers, No Animal Gelatin (added to some gummy vitamins)
